name: Downhill (adamzhajdu)
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 204

Description: It is a first-person view survival, horror game with exploration elements.

Story: You are in a rocky grassland. You have to collate all the spirit to complete the game.

Control: 
Sprint: Left Shift
Crouch: C
Slide: Left Shift + C

Made by
Viktoria Berta: Art Director https://www.artstation.com/viktoriaberta
Adam Hajdu: Environment Artist and Programmer https://www.artstation.com/adamzhajdu 
Migue Gessaghi and Ryan Gallagher: Music and SFX

Engine: Unreal Engine 5
Platform: PC
Mode: Single-player

Recommended System Requirement

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4720HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8.00GB
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960M
  • Storage: 1.3 GB
